   17: -module(downloader_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -import(ct_helper,[doc/1]).
   21: 
   22: all()->[download,fetch_content].
   23: 
   24: init_per_suite(_Config) ->
   25: 	[].
   26: 
   27: download(_Config)->
   28: 	doc("triggers a download"),
   29: 	{ok,Pid}=downloader:start_link(fun()-> "http://blog.gregormeyenberg.de" end),
   30: 	ok=downloader:download(Pid),
   31: 	a=b.
   32: 
   33: fetch_content(_Config)->
   34: 	doc("waits for 5s and then checks if downloaded content is available"),
   35: 	timer:sleep(timer:seconds(5)),
   36: 	Body=downloader_repository:get_web_content_body("http://blog.gregormeyenberg.de"),
   37: 	erlang:display(Body),
   38: 	true=(not_found=/=Body).
   39: 
   40: %%% internal
   41: get_pid_from_config(Config)->
   42: 	{pid,Pid}=lists:last(Config),
   43: 	Pid.
